mean_cn: v. 使加入圣徒之列，推崇，褒扬，将…封为圣徒
mean_en: to officially give a dead person a special status as someone very holy :to declare (someone) to be a saint
word_etyma: canon教规 + ize动词后缀 → canonize 封为圣徒
sentence: This saint was canonized for her virtue and dedication to God.
sentence_trans: 她因其美德和对上帝的奉献被封为圣徒。
